RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 10800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE ON THE TURF. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 30 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000. (If necessary will be run ONE MILE Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FLOWERS FOR LISA lost ground throughout emerging off a loose leader at mid track in upper stretch reeling in a tiring pacesetter late to win clear. MAGIC MOUNTAIN hustled out opened a solid lead on the backside widening to upper stretch shortening stride along the inside when run down late. RY'S REVENGE slow early lost ground to upper stretch gaining late seven wide. VOLTE FACE slow early lost ground to upper stretch getting involved late six wide. DEJOHN raced evenly through the far turn moving in the four path down the lane needing more at the end. WHISKEY SUNRISE tracked the pace through the far turn weakening down the lane. HOLY TRUTH was never involved. NOT A GAME raced mid pack weakening to upper stretch. RULING FRONT pressed the early pace wavering on the far turn fading into upper stretch. SOURNOIS in tight at the break stayed back throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Holy Truth
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Magic Mountain
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled out, opened lead backside, widened lane, weary run down

ENTRY.NAME: Dejohn
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, 4 wide lane, lacked punch

ENTRY.NAME: Flowers for Lisa
ENTRY.OWNER: MCM Racing LLC and Jansen Kenny
ENTRY.COMMENT: lost ground throughout, emerged mid track lane, rallied up

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Kenneth L. Ramsey & Sarah K. Ramsey

ENTRY.NAME: Ruling Front
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, tired,

ENTRY.NAME: Ry's Revenge
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lost ground to lane, gained late 7 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Whiskey Sunrise
ENTRY.OWNER: Vickers Richard T and Pena Yendri J
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, evenly to lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Sournois
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight break, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Not a Game
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Volte Face
ENTRY.OWNER: Bernardini Jay P and Carlino David
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, wide into lane, gained contention late 6 wide,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 90. Claiming Purse 14200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 30 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming Races For $8,500 Or Less Not Considered). (If necessary will be run SAME DISTA NCE Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SEE SPOT RUN gave a five wide middle move wresting the lead near mid track in upper stretch edging away late. ENJOY BASEBALL slow early rushed up six wide on the far turn rallying three deep down the lane saving place on the wire. VIOLIN MAKER went evenly chasing on the far turn extending inside down the lane moving between horses late. SCORSESE pressed on the backside dueling through the far turn then down the stretch coming up short late along the rail. SMASH hustled to the early lead set the pace to the far turn ceding there tiring in upper stretch. PICKFORD slow early played no factor. PONT DU GARD hustled along chased through the backside fading on the far turn. KANTPAYTHETOLL struggled well back throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Kantpaythetoll
ENTRY.COMMENT: struggled well back throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Violin Maker
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, vied far turn, extended lane, between horses late

ENTRY.NAME: Enjoy Baseball
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, 6 wide advance far turn, up three deep for place

ENTRY.NAME: Scorsese
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, dueled far turn to lane, short late on rail

ENTRY.NAME: Pickford
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Smash
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled out, set pace, ceded far turn, tired lane

ENTRY.NAME: Pont Du Gard
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, chased backside, used up far turn

ENTRY.NAME: See Spot Run
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5 wide middle move, led mid track lane, egded clear

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Wayne Hash, Travis Hash & Traci McCord

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 88. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 18800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 3 0 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility). (If necessary will be run SAME DISTANCE Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RIP THORN well rated fired on the far turn wresting the lead in upper stretch showing full of run to win going away. HARD COUNT hustled out pressing the pace through the backside clearing on the far turn being hooked in upper stretch proving no match there holding for place. FEVOLA slow early lagged to upper stretch responding there to finish well. TAMANRASSETT slow early was outrun to upper stretch picking up tired ones there from mid track. LIGHTNING JACK sent hard pressured the pace through the backside then tired on the far turn. THE HAPPY GIANT was always outrun. E. P. MILTON raced evenly through the backside then gave way on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Rip Thorn
ENTRY.COMMENT: well rated, fired far turn, led upper stretch, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Fevola
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lagged to lane, showed late interest

ENTRY.NAME: The Happy Giant
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: E. P. Milton
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, gave way far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Tamanrassett
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, outrun to lane, passed tired ones there

ENTRY.NAME: Hard Count
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled out, pressed pace, cleared far turn, hooked lane no match

ENTRY.NAME: Lightning Jack
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent hard, pressed pace, tired far turn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 59. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 30 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHARP JUSTICE pressured the pace through the turn shaking clear in upper stretch digging in late along the inside. JUST LIKE INDY was carried in at the break lagging early. rallied leaving the turn emerging off a loose leader in upper stretch chasing to wire as second best. MY PINK BABY BIRD pressed the pace dueling through the turn weakening in upper stretch. WACKER'S GIRL slow early played no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Just Like Indy
ENTRY.COMMENT: carried in break, rallied from turn, emerged top lane second best

ENTRY.NAME: My Pink Baby Bird
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Sharp Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled turn, shook clear lane, held inside

ENTRY.NAME: Wacker's Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, played no factor,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 5F Dirt CR: 49. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $15,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JUST JUBA pressed the pace dueling abreast rival through the turn bearing down on the outside late edging clear. WATCHING SNOW FLY chased the pace through the turn vying four wide down the lane rallying late to save place. BIT OF BLESSINGS pressed the pace dueling along the inside through the turn into upper stretch weakening late. SWORD OF DAMOCLES off slowly raced inside to upper stretch finishing evenly. FRANK THE BULL faded on the turn. WHY WINCHILL WHY was always outrun. CLASSY REY DE ORO retreated on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Frank the Bull
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Sword of Damocles
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, inside to lane, finished evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Why Winchill Why
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Watching Snow Fly
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, 4 wide lane, came on saving place

ENTRY.NAME: Classy Rey de Oro
ENTRY.OWNER: Miotke Elise Miotke Matthew and Energy Racing Stable LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: retreated on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Bit of Blessings
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled turn, extended lane, short late

ENTRY.NAME: Just Juba
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled abreast to lane, edged clear late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 30 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SOUTHERN SENSE sent clear moved alertly through the turn drawing off in upper stretch being kept to the task along the inside. PAPA CHARLES slow early rushed up along the inside on the turn angling out in upper stretch responding gamely the final eighth. BORN FOR VICTORY dropped back on the turn racing evenly down the lane which was enough to best the others. KAZTHAROS chased early then weakened on the turn. CHOPPED hustled along through the turn would tire in upper stretch. BENNY BOO BOO chased the pace to the quarter pole then wilted in upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Born for Victory
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back, evenly lane, outbid others

ENTRY.NAME: Benny Boo Boo
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, wilted

ENTRY.NAME: Kaztharos
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Chopped
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, tired lane

ENTRY.NAME: Southern Sense
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, drew off to lane, kept to task inside

ENTRY.NAME: Papa Charles
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, rushed up inside on the turn, angled out lane, gamely

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 93. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 18800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 3 0 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FREEDOM RIDER moved on pace wresting the lead on the far turn shaking clear in upper stretch holding along the inside under a drive. HIGH ROLLING DUDE tracked evenly to the far turn chasing into upper stretch surging late in the four path. LUCKY ANDY slow early raced evenly through the turn vying from mid track down the lane surging in the final yards. SUBJECT TO CHANGE set a pressured pace through the backside ceding on the far turn extending in the three path down the lane hanging late. INDIAN EMPIRE raced evenly in mid pack to upper stretch lacking a contending move there. GOLDEN TONE played no factor. LAUTREC faded on the far turn. CAPE LOOKOUT pressed the early pace then wilted on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Subject to Change
ENTRY.OWNER: Devane William E and King Adam
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, ceded far turn, chased lane, hung

ENTRY.NAME: High Rolling Dude
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked evenly, vied 4 wide lane, surged late saving place

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Tone
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Freedom Rider
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved on pace, led far turn, shook clear lane, held driving

ENTRY.NAME: Cape Lookout
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, wilted far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Indian Empire
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, evenly to lane, lacked late response,

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Andy
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, evenly far turn, 5 wide lane, rallied late

ENTRY.NAME: Lautrec
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on the far turn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 8100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 30 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LITTLE LUCERITO stalked the pace looming on the outside to upper stretch surging up gamely late. CELESTIAL ORB slow early lagged to upper stretch firing there surging gamely late along the inside. RUN AWAY FEVER slow early raced inside to upper stretch responding there to bid willingly late. OUT OF ROMANCE veered bumping at the break, lagged to upper stretch racing evenly there along the rail. MAMALONA pressed the pace dueling on the turn clearing in upper stretch faltering mid stretch between horses. CANELITA pressed the pace through the turn weakening in upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Mamalona
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled clear top lane, faltered between foes

ENTRY.NAME: Out of Romance
ENTRY.COMMENT: veered bumped break, lagged to lane, evenly insdie

ENTRY.NAME: Canelita
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled on turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Little Lucerito
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, loomed outside to lane, rallied up late mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Run Away Fever
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, outside to lane, rallied upper stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Celestial Orb
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lagged to lane, surged upper stretch, bid gamely,
